var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "v-app",
    [
      _c("admin-side-bar"),
      [
        _c("v-data-table", {
          staticClass: "elevation-1",
          attrs: { headers: _vm.headers, items: _vm.foodList },
          scopedSlots: _vm._u(
            [
              {
                key: "top",
                fn: function () {
                  return [
                    _c(
                      "v-toolbar",

                      [
                        _c("v-toolbar-title", [_vm._v("My CRUD")]),

                        }),

                          {

                              {

                                            attrs: {
                                              color: "primary",
                                              dark: "",
                                            },
                                          },
                                          "v-btn",
                                          attrs,

                                        ),
                                        on

                                    ),

                                },
                              },
                            ]),
                            model: {
                              value: _vm.dialog,
                              callback: function ($$v) {
                                _vm.dialog = $$v
                              },
                              expression: "dialog",
                            },
                          },
                          [

                              {
                                ref: "movieForm",
                                model: {
                                  value: _vm.movieForm,
                                  callback: function ($$v) {
                                    _vm.movieForm = $$v
                                  },
                                  expression: "movieForm",
                                },
                              },
                              [
                                _c(
                                  "v-card",
                                  [
                                    _c("v-card-title", [
                                      _c("span", { staticClass: "text-h5" }, [
                                        _vm._v(_vm._s(_vm.formTitle)),
                                      ]),
                                    ]),
                                    _c(
                                      "v-card-text",
                                      [
                                        _c(
                                          "v-container",
                                          [
                                            _c(
                                              "v-row",
                                              [
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-col",
                                                  {
                                                    attrs: {
                                                      cols: "12",
                                                      sm: "6",
                                                    },
                                                  },
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-text-field", {
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        label: "Food Name",
                                                      },
                                                      model: {
                                                        value:
                                                          _vm.editedItem
                                                            .foodName,
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.$set(
                                                            _vm.editedItem,
                                                            "foodName",
                                                            $$v
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "editedItem.foodName",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-col",
                                                  {
                                                    attrs: {
                                                      cols: "12",
                                                      sm: "6",
                                                    },
                                                  },
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-select", {
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        items: _vm.categoryList,
                                                        "item-text":
                                                          "categoryName",
                                                        "item-value": "id",
                                                        rules: [
                                                          (v) =>
                                                            !!v || "Required",
                                                        ],
                                                        label: "Category",
                                                        required: "",
                                                      },
                                                      model: {
                                                        value: _vm.categoryName,
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.categoryName = $$v
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "categoryName",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                            _c(
                                              "v-row",
                                              [
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-col",
                                                  {
                                                    attrs: {
                                                      cols: "12",
                                                      sm: "6",
                                                    },
                                                  },
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-text-field", {
                                                      model: {
                                                        value:
                                                          _vm.editedItem
                                                            .foodPrice,
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.$set(
                                                            _vm.editedItem,
                                                            "foodPrice",
                                                            $$v
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "editedItem.foodPrice",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                                _c(
                                                  "v-col",
                                                  {
                                                    attrs: {
                                                      cols: "12",
                                                      sm: "6",
                                                    },
                                                  },
                                                  [
                                                    _c("v-text-field", {
                                                      attrs: { label: "Price" },
                                                      model: {
                                                        value:
                                                          _vm.editedItem
                                                            .foodPrice,
                                                        callback: function (
                                                          $$v
                                                        ) {
                                                          _vm.$set(
                                                            _vm.editedItem,
                                                            "foodPrice",
                                                            $$v
                                                          )
                                                        },
                                                        expression:
                                                          "editedItem.foodPrice",
                                                      },
                                                    }),
                                                  ],
                                                  1
                                                ),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                            _c(
                                              "v-row",
                                              [
                                                _c("v-file-input", {
                                                  attrs: {
                                                    label: "Poster",
                                                    "show-size": "",
                                                    "prepend-icon":
                                                      "mdi-camera",
                                                    placeholder:
                                                      "Choose Poster Image",
                                                    accept:
                                                      "image/png, image/jpeg",
                                                    rules: [
                                                      (v) => !!v || "Required",
                                                      (v) =>
                                                        !v ||
                                                        v.size < 10000000 ||
                                                        "Image size should be less than 10 MB!",
                                                    ],
                                                  },
                                                  on: {
                                                    change: _vm.onChangePoster,
                                                  },
                                                  model: {
                                                    value: _vm.poster,
                                                    callback: function ($$v) {
                                                      _vm.poster = $$v
                                                    },
                                                    expression: "poster",
                                                  },
                                                }),
                                                _vm.posterPreviewPath != null
                                                  ? _c("v-img", {
                                                      attrs: {
                                                        src: _vm.posterPreviewPath,
                                                        width: "200",
                                                        height: "150",
                                                        contain: "",
                                                      },
                                                    })
                                                  : _vm._e(),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                            _c("v-checkbox", {
                                              attrs: {
                                                value: "editedItem.isAvaliable",
                                                label: "Avaliable",
                                              },
                                              model: {
                                                value:
                                                  _vm.editedItem.isAvaliable,
                                                callback: function ($$v) {
                                                  _vm.$set(
                                                    _vm.editedItem,
                                                    "isAvaliable",
                                                    $$v
                                                  )
                                                },
                                                expression:
                                                  "editedItem.isAvaliable",
                                              },
                                            }),
                                          ],
                                          1
                                        ),
                                      ],
                                      1
                                    ),
                                    _c(
                                      "v-card-actions",
                                      [
                                        _c("v-spacer"),
                                        _c(
                                          "v-btn",
                                          {
                                            attrs: {
                                              color: "blue darken-1",
                                              text: "",
                                            },
                                            on: { click: _vm.close },
                                          },
                                          [_vm._v(" Cancel ")]
                                        ),
                                        _c(
                                          "v-btn",
                                          {
                                            attrs: {
                                              color: "blue darken-1",
                                              text: "",
                                            },
                                            on: {
                                              click: function ($event) {
                                                return _vm.createMovie()
                                              },
                                            },
                                          },
                                          [_vm._v(" Save ")]
                                        ),
                                      ],
                                      1
                                    ),
                                  ],
                                  1
                                ),
                              ],
                              1
                            ),
                          ],
                          1
                        ),
                        _vm._v(" //End Create "),
                        _c(
                          "v-dialog",
                          {
                            attrs: { "max-width": "500px" },
                            model: {
                              value: _vm.dialogDelete,
                              callback: function ($$v) {
                                _vm.dialogDelete = $$v
                              },
                              expression: "dialogDelete",
                            },
                          },
                          [
                            _c(
                              "v-card",
                              [
                                _c("v-card-title", { staticClass: "text-h5" }, [
                                  _vm._v(
                                    "Are you sure you want to delete this item?"
                                  ),
                                ]),
                                _c(
                                  "v-card-actions",
                                  [
                                    _c("v-spacer"),
                                    _c(
                                      "v-btn",
                                      {
                                        attrs: {
                                          color: "blue darken-1",
                                          text: "",
                                        },
                                        on: { click: _vm.closeDelete },
                                      },
                                      [_vm._v("Cancel")]
                                    ),
                                    _c(
                                      "v-btn",
                                      {
                                        attrs: {
                                          color: "blue darken-1",
                                          text: "",
                                        },
                                        on: { click: _vm.deleteItemConfirm },
                                      },
                                      [_vm._v("OK")]
                                    ),
                                    _c("v-spacer"),
                                  ],
                                  1
                                ),
                              ],
                              1
                            ),
                          ],
                          1
                        ),
                      ],
                      1
                    ),
                  ]
                },
                proxy: true,
              },
              {
                key: `item.actions`,
                fn: function ({ item }) {
                  return [
                    _c(
                      "v-icon",
                      {
                        staticClass: "mr-2",
                        attrs: { small: "" },
                        on: {
                          click: function ($event) {
                            return _vm.editItem(item)
                          },
                        },
                      },
                      [_vm._v(" mdi-pencil ")]
                    ),
                    _c(
                      "v-icon",
                      {
                        attrs: { small: "" },
                        on: {
                          click: function ($event) {
                            return _vm.deleteItem(item)
                          },
                        },
                      },
                      [_vm._v(" mdi-delete ")]
                    ),
                  ]
                },
              },
            ],
            null,
            true
          ),
        }),
      ],
    ],
    2
  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
